H0.text: how many us states are commonwealths and which states are they. Massachusetts

H1.text: how many us states are commonwealths and which states are they. Pennsylvania

H2.text: how many us states are commonwealths and which states are they. Kentucky

H3.text: how many us states are commonwealths and which states are they. Virginia

A4.text: Commonwealth is a term used by four of the 50 states of the United States in their full official names: Kentucky, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania, and Virginia.

A5.text: Massachusetts is officially named The Commonwealth of Massachusetts by its constitution.
